revised_title: Forces on a Solid Body in a Stream of Viscous Fluid: A Comprehensive Analysis
tldr: The author investigates the forces on a solid body in a stream of viscous fluid, focusing on lift and drag. They use a system of linear equations to obtain a complete solution, which is divided into particular integrals and a complementary function. The study finds that the drag is associated with an irrotational solution, and the lift is connected to diffused trailing vortices in the fluid. This research provides a deeper understanding of fluid dynamics and the forces acting on objects in a fluid.
